entries.name: Void Black Magic
entries: You know the cantrip Sapping Sting. At 3rd level you learn Toll the Dead. At 5th level you can cast Arms of Hadar once per day without a spell slot. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Unnerving Presence
entries: You have advantage on saving throws to avoid being frightened by aberrations or creatures of the Void.
